alert.note: Alert for Concho; Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 9:02AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Tom Green and northwestern Concho Counties through 945 AM CDT... At 902 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Goodfellow Air Force Base, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Angelo, Mereta, Veribest, Wall, Vancourt, Twin Buttes Reservoir, Lake Nasworthy, Eola, Goodfellow Air Force Base, Vick, Harriet and The Intersection Of Ranch Road 380 And Ranch Road 381. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
